Bleusailles: Captain Warlok suggests you do some combat training.
Meet captain Warlok at the entrance of the Bastion of Haalmikah.
He will guide you to the training grounds.
Meet captain Warlok at the Grove of Haalmikah.
The Grove is located West of the bastion.
Equip the weapon given by the captain then report to him.
Access the Equipment tab from the main menu to equip it.
Defeat the Reat at the Grove of Haalmikah.
Report to the captain about the Rat.
Defeat the Scarymbe at the Grove of Haalmikah.
It wanders around the North-East of the grove.
Report to the captain about the Scarymbe.
